workExperience.title: Frontend Developer
workExperience.description: I worked as a frontend developer at the CRM and Live Chat products of Next4biz. I was responsible for the development of the CRM product, which is a web-based application that allows users to manage their customer relationships. I also worked on the development of the Live Chat product, which is a web-based application that allows users to communicate with their customers in real-time.
achievements: ‚óè I developed huge system that reaches millions of people.
‚óè I was responsible for JavaScript architecture and development of the CRM product. Also I designed some UI's of the product.
‚óè I learned frontend architecure with React and Redux in here.

workExperience.title: JavaScript Developer

‚óè I was responsible for JavaScript on frontend also backend designs.
‚óè I developed some API's and utility packages for their locale SDK.
